name: Alex's Journey 2 (Demo)
description:
Short story (for the demo): Egad Horrmor shows up with a new plan and seizes an island, it's up to Alex and Racky to stop him before he takes over fully

Controls

X to run, Z to attack, Arrow keys to move, Space to jump

Note while playing as Racky: Press Z and Space at the same time in air to Fly
